heading: ***WIND ADVISORY THROUGH NY AND THE CHAMPLAIN VALLEY THIS AFTERNOON INTO EARLY FRIDAY, AND SOUTHERN VT AND NH INTO MA FRIDAY AND FRIDAY NIGHT***Today
text: Variable clouds and sunshine. Breezy and mild. Highs in the 40s, some upper 30s through the northern CT Valley and northern NH. Winds becoming south 10 to 15 mph, gusting to 25 mph east of the Green Mountains, and 15 to 25 mph, gusting 35 to 45 mph from the Green Mountains west.

heading: Tonight
text: Becoming cloudy, with periods of rain and showers spreading west to east, mainly after midnight. Early lows in the 30s to near 40, rising through the 40s overnight. South winds 10 to 25 mph, gusting 30 to 45 mph, up to 55 mph west.

heading: Friday
text: Rain, mixing or changing to snow showers from west to east, starting in the Adirondacks, then the Green Mountains, lowering to the valleys north, while rain tapers off south. Highs in the upper 40s to low 50s, falling west to east. Winds from the south 15 to 30 mph, gusting 40 to 55 mph, shifting to the west and decreasing.
